meanings.definition: A unit of capacitance equal to one millionth of a farad.
meanings.sent1: I need a microfarad to complete the circuit.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device requires a microfarad for optimal performance.
meanings.sent3: Why did the capacitor break up with the microfarad? It couldn't handle the voltage.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a microfarad, storing tiny fragments of the past.
meanings.sent5: The tiny microfarad held the key to unlocking the power of the device.
